description: This file defines a class MoviePyVideoTools that provides methods for processing videos, including extracting audio, transcribing speech, creating captions, and embedding captions into videos using the MoviePy library. It includes methods for splitting transcribed text into subtitle lines, creating caption clips with highlighting, parsing SRT files, and embedding captions into videos.

classes.name: MoviePyVideoTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for processing videos, extracting audio, transcribing, and adding captions using MoviePy.

methods.name: split_text_into_lines
methods.description: Splits transcribed words into subtitle lines based on duration, character count, and gap constraints.

methods.name: create_caption_clips
methods.description: Creates word-level caption clips with highlighting effects for a given subtitle line.

methods.name: parse_srt
methods.description: Parses SRT formatted subtitle content into a list of words with timing information.

methods.name: extract_audio
methods.description: Extracts audio from a video file using MoviePy.

methods.name: create_srt
methods.description: Creates an SRT file from transcription text.

methods.name: embed_captions
methods.description: Embeds scrolling captions and word-level highlighting into a video, producing a new captioned video.
